title: Mike Novogratz Doubles Down on $10,000 Bitcoin
description: Billionaire and ex-fund manager Mike Novogratz has restated his belief that bitcoin will end the year at $10,000, adding that ethereum could close at $500.
author: Omkar Godbole

title: What's Next for Bitcoin Cash? Stopping User Fund Loss
description: The rift between bitcoin and its offshoot bitcoin cash isn't just ideological – it's hazardous.
author: Omkar Godbole

title: Wallet-Monero Is a New Website Attempting to Steal Your XMR
description: A lot of people have started paying attention to Monero as of late. This also means people are looking for proper wallets to store their XMR.
author: JP Buntinx

title: Who Needs a CSD? Nivaura to Issue First Regulated Ether Bond
description: Blockchain startup Nivaura has today initiated its first bond denominated exclusively in ether.
author: Omkar Godbole

title: New Code Released for Vlad Zamfir's Ethereum 'Casper' Upgrade
description: The initial version of the Casper proof-of-stake protocol upgrade from Ethereum developer Vlad Zamfir has been released.
author: Omkar Godbole

title: Bank Negara Malaysia Will Introduce Crypto Regulation in Early 2018
description: Governments around the world are actively looking for ways to regulate Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.
author: JP Buntinx

title: R3, Microsoft Expand Partnership to Boost Corda DLT Adoption
description: Distributed ledger technology (DLT) firm R3 is moving to more deeply integrate its Corda platform with Microsoft's Azure cloud service.
author: Sujha Sundararajan

title: JPMorgan Contemplates Providing Bitcoin Futures Trading
description: The plot continues to thicken when it comes to JPMorgan Chase and Bitcoin. After its CEO denounced Bitcoin as a fraud, customers started buying Bitcoin in large quantities.
author: JP Buntinx

title: Lightning Can Scale Bitcoin, But Are Costs a Barrier?
description: It's possible bitcoin's Lightning Network will fall short of its lofty ambition – at least, that's what a group of researchers are arguing.
author: Omkar Godbole

title: Sacramento Regional Transit Hackers Demand $8K Bitcoin Ransom
description: It has been a while since we last heard anything about hackers demanding a Bitcoin ransom.
author: JP Buntinx
